title: Is the TalkBand B2 water and dust resistant? Can I wear it while swimming or diving?
answer:
The TalkBand B2 is IP57 - water and dust resistant, making is suitable for everyday use. If B2 comes into contact with water during rain, washing hands, etc. make sure to wipe it dry with a cloth.

It is strongly recommended that you DO NOT wear the B2 while swimming, diving, showering and any other activity with constant exposure to water.
